Sara

From: Scott Robertson [mailto:serobertson@hotmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, February 07, 2012 12:46 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Link to information
Sara,
I'm going to just do straight W-2 right now with Crescent Solutions. I will be willing to consider other options next year.
Thank you for your time,
Scott Robertson From: sconde@mbopartners.com To: serobertson@hotmail.com Date: Thu, 2 Feb 2012 17:55:45 -0500 Subject: RE: Link to information Hi Scott,
Hope you are doing well. Just wanted to follow up and see if you still planned on using and MBO and if you have any questions for me. Please let me know when you have a moment.
Thank you, Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
